name: Inside The Machine Gun
description:
As a spirit in the machine gun, please help the human to survive in the zombies waves.
There are 20 waves of them!!

Control:

  • Move spirit with cursor
  • [TAB] to switch scene 
  • W,A,S,D to move the human
  • Left mouse click to shoot

When you control the spirit, the time of the human actually slow down.
